thread.title: Trump Drops MAJOR Hint About Who Scalia’s Replacement May Be…
thread.title_full: Trump Drops MAJOR Hint About Who Scalia’s Replacement May Be…

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Trump Drops MAJOR Hint About Who Scalia’s Replacement May Be…
text:
This past presidential election was important for a number of reasons. 
One of the most convincing reasons to support Donald Trump was the fact that the Supreme Court would have been lost for a generation if Hillary Clinton had become president. 
Now, conservatives have an opportunity to make a real difference in that area. 
Trump has already provided us with a list that he will choose his SCOTUS picks from. 
Recently, the media has been speculating about who Trump will nominate to replace Antonin Scalia. 
We might have a clue… 
President-elect Donald Trump met with Judge William Pryor of the 11th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals, a lead contender for his first appointment to the Supreme Court, at Trump Tower late Saturday. 
Above the Law’s David Lat broke news of the Pryor meeting. 
Trump told reporters Wednesday that he expects to name a nominee to the high court in late January, during the second week of his administration. He also confirmed he has met with a number of candidates from the list of potential nominees he released during the campaign. Given that timeframe, and the fact Pryor is widely considered a frontrunner for the appointment, the Saturday meeting suggests Trump is in the final stages of the selection process. 
Pryor looks like a solid pick. 
Who knows which way Trump is going to go though. 
Stay tuned…
